member.name: M:CMS.URLRewritingEngine.CMSMvcHandler.GetRoutingPattern(System.String,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary)
member.summary: Gets the URL pattern from wildcard URL path and places the default values into the defaults name-value collection
member.param: If set, returns the default values of the wildcards

member.name: M:CMS.URLRewritingEngine.CMSMvcHandler.ParseWildcardElement(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary)
member.summary:
Parses single wildcard element and extracts its value to the defaults collection. Returns the element without the default value
Handles following scenarios:
{name} - No changes, standard wilcard without default value {name;value} - Outputs the value as the hard part of the URL, value is also added to the defaults {?name;value} - Makes optional parameter wildcard with value added to defaults
member.param: If set, returns the default values of the wildcards

member.name: P:CMS.URLRewritingEngine.CMSMvcHandler.UseDefaultValuesInPattern
member.summary: If true, the default values of pattern elements are used in the pattern
